title: Zyxel security advisory (AV26-092)
description: On February 5, 2026, Zyxel published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: ATP  versions ZLD V5.35 to V5.41
USG FLEX  versions ZLD V5.35 to V5.41
USG FLEX 50(W)/ USG20(W)-VPN  versions ZLD V5.35 to V5.41
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
